title: The Wild and Wonderful Whites of West Virginia
description:
Today on the podcast, Tig and Cheryl take a truly wild (and wonderful? TBD) ride through one of the most chaotic docs of all time, "The Wild and Wonderful Whites of West Virginia." It's an incredibly candid conversation full of "fresh takes", as well as an educational detour (led by Cheryl) into the history of merkins. ALSO, get your tickets to see Tig and Cheryl streaming LIVE this Thursday... tickets at loopedlive.com! *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com) Get merch at podswag.com/truestory

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
